Texts.Chs: 把^orange;肥料^reset;带回^orange;科学前哨站^reset;给^green;我^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^green;Fertilizer^reset; to ^orange;me^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 现在你可以制作让作物更出色成长的化合物了！如果你可以把^orange;炼金台^reset;升级到^green;化学操作台^reset;，请不要犹豫！
Texts.Eng: Now you can create some more advanced chemicals, and grow even better crops! Upgrade your ^orange;Alchemy Table^reset; into a ^green;Chemistry Lab^reset; as soon as you are able.

Texts.Chs: ^orange;肥料^white;是任何植物都必不可少的。如果你打算做一些，首先你得要有^orange;炼金台^reset;。你可以为我制造一些肥料吗？
Texts.Eng: ^orange;Fertilizer^white; is essential to produce plants of any real value. To make some, you will first need an ^orange;Alchemy Table^reset;. ^green;I need one barrel of fertilizer^reset; for this project. Bring me some, would you?
